thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: John H Sweat
thread.title_full: Dyers RV reviewed by John H Sweat

author: John H Sweat
title: John H Sweat
text: I am well satisfied with this company and the employees I dealt with. My order was damaged in shipment and when I notified Dyers, they had item picked up and another sent to me in very good time frame. The people were courteous and professional at all times. I highly recommend this company and will use them in future if needed.
